other_tests.findings: Obvious enlargement of the left heart and right atrium, massive tricuspid regurgitation (14.9 cm2), and elevated pulmonary artery systolic pressure (42 mmHg).
No pulmonary arterial hypertension with a mean pulmonary artery pressure of 20 mmHg, a pulmonary capillary wedge pressure of 9 mmHg, and a pulmonary vascular resistance of 2.16 Wood.
Detected heterozygous variants of the ACVRL1 gene c.1358del (p.N453T) in exon9, which has pathogenic significance according to biological analysis.
